index.title: Case Studies | WebAble Digital | A Digital Marketing Agency In Bangladesh

i-am-real.title: I am Real | Case Studies | WebAble Digital | A Digital Marketing Agency In Bangladesh
i-am-real.description: TBy executing a Facebook campaign, WebAble Digital helped build a community of 80,000 juice lovers which drove sales, in-store & on bottleoffun.com.

dell.title: Dell | Case Studies | WebAble Digital | A Digital Marketing Agency In Bangladesh
dell.description: WebAble Digital's campaign for Dell generated 99k clicks on their landing page leading to a whooping 3,800 orders & sales of over BDT 120m in 25 days.

champs21.title: Champs21 | Case Studies | WebAble Digital | A Digital Marketing Agency In Bangladesh
champs21.description: WebAble Digital drove 2,601 downloads of the Spelling Bee - 'Spell Champs' app within 30 days with a cost per user acquisition of USD .70 (CPA)

kaspersky.title: Kasperskey | Case Studies | WebAble Digital | A Digital Marketing Agency In Bangladesh
kaspersky.description: The campaign had generated 70,000 clicks and 5,000 sign-ups. Kaspersky Labs took over social media for the day, courtesy of WebAble Digital.

aarong.title: Aarong | Case Studies | WebAble Digital | A Digital Marketing Agency In Bangladesh
aarong.description: The social media campaign by WebAble Digital served 1,000,000 impressions to 600K Bangladeshis across Facebook and G&R to drive 40,000 actions.

ra.title: Rahimafrooz | Case Studies | WebAble Digital | A Digital Marketing Agency In Bangladesh
ra.description: An omni-channel campaign by WebAble Digital that generated 60 unique stories, engaged 2 million Bangladeshis and drove 200,000 social media actions.

preetom.title: Preetom | Case Studies | WebAble Digital | A Digital Marketing Agency In Bangladesh
preetom.description: WebAble Digital's viral Facebook campaign that generated 305 written reviews and 5 video reviews for the popular burger chain, Preetom.

jaago.title: JAAGO | Case Studies | WebAble Digital | A Digital Marketing Agency In Bangladesh
jaago.description: A global scale digital campaign by WebAble Digital that led to 235 sponsors and BDT 42 million annual sponsorship revenue for the JAAGO Foundation.

cm.title: CM Petrol | Case Studies | WebAble Digital | A Digital Marketing Agency In Bangladesh
cm.description: CM petrol's social media campaign by WebAble Digital was the first of its kind in Bangladesh as octane sales increased by 20% within the month.
